channel.title: Stockwatch - Key Events
channel.description: Real-time corporate announcements, deals, and financial results.

item.title: [5PAISA] 5paisa Capital Ltd Closes Trading Window for Designated Persons Until 48 Hours Post Board Meeting on Proposed Right Issue
item.description:
5paisa Capital Ltd has announced the closure of the trading window for all designated persons, including directors and promoters, and their immediate relatives. The closure is in accordance with the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015 and the company's Code of Conduct. The trading window will remain closed until 48 hours after the Board of Directors or the Right Issue Committee considers, discusses, and decides various matters related to the proposed right issue. These matters include the determination of the issue price, rights entitlement ratio, record date, timing of the issue, and other incidental matters. Designated persons and their immediate relatives are advised not to trade in the securities of the company during the closure of the trading window.

  • 5paisa Capital Ltd closes trading window for designated persons and their immediate relatives
  • Closure in accordance with SEBI PIT Regulations and company's Code of Conduct
  • Trading window to remain closed until 48 hours post Board of Directors/Right Issue Committee meeting on proposed right issue
  • Matters to be discussed include issue price, rights entitlement ratio, record date, and timing of the issue
  • Designated persons and their immediate relatives advised not to trade in the securities of the company during the closure of the trading window

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: 5paisa Capital Ltd | Category: Board Meeting

item.title: [ORIENTELEC] Orient Electric Ltd Clarifies on Increase in Share Volume
item.description:
Orient Electric Ltd has clarified that there is no information or announcement that may have a bearing on the volume of shares of the company. The company is not aware of any information that led to the significant increase in the volume of shares. They have committed to timely disclosure of any price sensitive information that may affect the price or volume of shares.

  • Orient Electric Ltd is not aware of any information that led to the increase in share volume
  • The company has committed to timely disclosure of any price sensitive information

Company: Orient Electric Ltd | Category: Business Update

item.title: [PAISALO] Paisalo Digital Ltd Allots Commercial Papers Worth INR 30,00,00,000
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Paisalo Digital Ltd has allotted Commercial Papers worth INR 30,00,00,000 in a private placement. The CPs have a face value of INR 5,00,000 each and an issue price of INR 4,86,064. The total number of CPs allotted is 600 with an issue value of INR 29,16,38,400. The tenure of the CPs is 91 days from the date of allotment. The ISIN is INE420C14243 and the date of allotment is February 27, 2026. The date of maturity/redemption is May 29, 2026. The name of the IPA is Bank of Maharashtra.

  • Paisalo Digital Ltd allots Commercial Papers worth INR 30,00,00,000
  • CPs issued in a private placement
  • Face value of INR 5,00,000 each and issue price of INR 4,86,064
  • Total number of CPs allotted is 600 with an issue value of INR 29,16,38,400
  • Tenure of the CPs is 91 days from the date of allotment
  • ISIN INE420C14243, date of allotment February 27, 2026, and date of maturity/redemption May 29, 2026
  • Bank of Maharashtra is the IPA

Company: Paisalo Digital Ltd | Category: Investment

item.title: [MAMATA] Mamata Machinery secures its maiden ROW Order for its Packaging Machinery Segment from South Africa
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Mamata Machinery Limited, a leading machinery solution provider in the flexible packaging industry, has secured its first Rest of the World (ROW) order for its Packaging Machinery Segment from a customer in South Africa. This order is a significant milestone for Mamata as it expands its global footprint for its Packaging Machinery Segment beyond its established markets in the US and India. The order is scheduled for delivery in Q2 FY27. This South African order is a validation of Mamata's efforts to penetrate emerging international markets for its Packaging Machinery Segment, which is the key growth driver for Mamata Machinery going forward. Mamata continues to engage with a diverse customer base across geographies in Europe, Africa, Middle East, Asia and South-Central America, through sustained marketing initiatives. Mamata Machinery Limited is a leading global provider of total flexible packaging machinery solutions, offering a comprehensive range of products across the value-chain, from co-extrusion to converting and advanced packaging machinery. With over 35 years of industry experience, Mamata has established itself as a trusted engineering enterprise, boasting more than 5,000 machine installations in 80 countries worldwide.

  • Mamata Machinery secures its first Rest of the World (ROW) order for its Packaging Machinery Segment from South Africa.
  • This order is a significant milestone for Mamata as it expands its global footprint for its Packaging Machinery Segment beyond its established markets in the US and India.
  • The order is scheduled for delivery in Q2 FY27.
  • This South African order is a validation of Mamata's efforts to penetrate emerging international markets.
  • Mamata Machinery Limited is a leading global provider of total flexible packaging machinery solutions.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Mamata Machinery Ltd | Category: New Launch

item.title: [INDSWFTLAB] Essix Biosciences Acquires 51 Lakh Equity Shares in Ind-Swift Laboratories Through Warrant Conversion
item.description:
Essix Biosciences Limited, a member of the Promoter & Promoter Group of Ind-Swift Laboratories Limited, has acquired 51,00,000 equity shares of Ind-Swift Laboratories. The acquisition was made on February 24, 2026, pursuant to the conversion of Fully Convertible Warrants into Equity Shares. This disclosure is made under Regulation 29(2) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Substantial Acquisition of Shares and Takeovers) Regulations, 2011.

  • Essix Biosciences, a member of Ind-Swift Laboratories Promoter & Promoter Group, acquired 51,00,000 equity shares
  • The acquisition was made on February 24, 2026, pursuant to the conversion of Fully Convertible Warrants into Equity Shares
  • The transaction is disclosed under Regulation 29(2) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Substantial Acquisition of Shares and Takeovers) Regulations, 2011

Company: IND-SWIFT LABORATORIES LTD. | Category: Acquisitions

item.title: [DICIND] DIC India Ltd to Conduct 78th AGM on March 23, 2026
item.description:
DIC India Ltd has announced that its 78th Annual General Meeting (AGM) will be held on Monday, March 23, 2026, at 11:00 A.M. IST through Video Conference (VC) or Other Audio-Visual Means (OAVM). The meeting will transact ordinary business such as the consideration and adoption of the Audited Financial Statements for the year ended December 31, 2025, and the appointment of a director in place of Mr. HAYATO KASHIWAGI. The meeting will also transact special business such as the appointment of M/S Chandra Wadhwa & Co. as a cost auditor for the financial year 2026 and the re-appointment of MR. ADNAN WAJHAT AHMAD as an Independent Director for a second term.

  • DIC India Ltd to conduct 78th AGM on March 23, 2026 through VC/OAVM
  • Consideration and adoption of Audited Financial Statements for the year ended December 31, 2025
  • Appointment of a director in place of Mr. HAYATO KASHIWAGI
  • Appointment of M/S Chandra Wadhwa & Co. as a cost auditor for the financial year 2026
  • Re-appointment of MR. ADNAN WAJHAT AHMAD as an Independent Director for a second term

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: DIC INDIA LTD. | Category: Board Meeting

item.title: [JSLINDL] JSL Industries Secures Prestigious Order of Rs. 2.91 Crores from Gujarat Energy Transmission Corporation
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

The Instrument Transformer Division of JSL Industries Ltd. has secured an order of Rs. 2.91 Crores (excluding GST) for the supply of 66KV Class CT/PT from Gujarat Energy Transmission Corporation Limited, Vadodara, Gujarat. The order is significant as it highlights the company's capabilities in the Instrument Transformer Division. The order will be executed by 30/09/2026. The payment terms, packing, forwarding, freight, insurance, and GST are as per the terms mentioned in the order. The guarantee period is 60 months from the date of receipt of material at the customerâ€™s stores, out of which 12 months from the date of commissioning or 18 months from the date of supply will be supported by a Bank Guarantee of 10% of the contract value. The order does not fall under related party transactions and the promoter/promoter group/group companies do not have any interest in the entity that awarded the order.

  • JSL Industries secures order of Rs. 2.91 Crores from Gujarat Energy Transmission Corporation
  • Order for the supply of 66KV Class CT/PT
  • Execution time: 30/09/2026
  • Guarantee period of 60 months from the date of receipt of material at the customerâ€™s stores
  • Does not fall under related party transactions

Company: JSL INDUSTRIES LTD. | Category: Deals

item.title: [THOMASCOOK] Thomas Cook India launches Marathi Europe Tours, appoints Subodh Bhave as brand ambassador
item.description:
Thomas Cook (India) Limited has launched a dedicated Marathi Special Holidays portfolio and appointed acclaimed Marathi actor Subodh Bhave as the goodwill brand ambassador for the Maharashtra market. The initiative debuts with special Europe group departures designed exclusively for Maharashtrian travellers, reflecting the Companyâ€™s strategic focus on regional personalisation and deeper cultural connect. The Marathi Special Europe Holidays are group tours that seamlessly blend international aspiration with regional comfort, offering immersive experiences across iconic European destinations including Switzerland, France, Italy and Austria.

  • Launch of dedicated Marathi Special Holidays portfolio
  • Appointment of Subodh Bhave as brand ambassador for Maharashtra market
  • Special Europe group departures for Maharashtrian travellers
  • Strategic focus on regional personalisation and cultural connect
  • Immersive experiences across iconic European destinations

Company: THOMAS COOK (INDIA) LTD. | Category: Management Change

item.title: [SUNSHIEL] Swarna Malhotra Acquires Additional Shares in Sunshield Chemicals Ltd
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Swarna Malhotra, along with Indus Petrochem Limited, Coppersmith Energies and Project Private Limited, and Sudhir Malhotra, have acquired additional shares in Sunshield Chemicals Ltd. The acquisition was made through the open market and the total holding of the acquirer along with PACs now stands at 66.11% of the diluted share/voting capital of the company.

  • Swarna Malhotra and associates have acquired additional shares in Sunshield Chemicals Ltd.
  • The acquisition was made through the open market.
  • The total holding of the acquirer along with PACs is now 66.11% of the diluted share/voting capital of the company.
  • Sunshield Chemicals Ltd's equity share capital and total voting capital remain unchanged after the acquisition.

Company: SUNSHIELD CHEMICALS LTD. | Category: Acquisitions

item.title: [JINDALPOLY] Jindal Poly Films Ltd Clarifies Price Movement on Stock Exchange
item.description:
Jindal Poly Films Ltd has clarified the recent significant movement in the price of their security across exchanges. The company stated that the movement in volume/price of shares is market-driven and they have disclosed every event required under Regulation 30 of Securities And Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015. They also committed to notifying the exchanges upon the occurrence of any price sensitive information/event as required under Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.

  • Jindal Poly Films Ltd clarifies price movement on stock exchange
  • Price movement is market-driven
  • Company has disclosed every event required under Regulation 30 of Securities And Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
  • Commitment to notify exchanges upon occurrence of any price sensitive information/event as required under Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015

Company: JINDAL POLY FILMS LTD. | Category: Business Update
